title: Redis Cache Layer
prompt: Create a caching architecture diagram showing Redis as the hot data layer. Center: Large Redis logo (red cube) with label 'Redis Cache'. Left side: 'Slow Path' arrow from TimescaleDB (elephant icon) going around Redis - labeled '100ms'. Right side: 'Fast Path' arrow going directly through Redis - labeled '<1ms' with lightning bolt. Show cached data types as small boxes around Redis: 'Latest Candles', 'Current Regime', 'Active POIs', 'Open Positions'. Include TTL (time-to-live) indicators. Bottom: Show cache hit/miss ratio gauge. Use Redis red (#DC382D) as accent, dark background (#1E293B). Performance-focused visualization with speed comparisons.
negative_prompt: complex network topology, too many nodes, cluttered labels, inconsistent iconography
